localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Getting attention for your startup is not easy, but our platform makes it simple. EllisX connects startups with high-quality podcasts, writers and speaking engagements based on mutual interest. Connect with them in 2 clicks. Yes, itâ€™s that easy.
nodes.title: EllisX 2.0 - The easiest way to spread the word about your startup
nodes.author: KP

nodes.excerpt: Rent Smart. Rest Easy. Renting can feel like you're not in control. Learn and share about the experiences that others have had. A large portion of your income goes to rent. Increase the transparency available to know where you're investing your money.
nodes.title: Good Neighbour - Share your rental experience for future tenants.
nodes.author: Drew Minns

nodes.excerpt: Craftgate, a cloud-based payment gateway, provides you safe processing through a single integration and allows you on growing your business.
nodes.title: Craftgate - Cloud-based payment gateway
nodes.author: Hakan ERDOGAN

nodes.excerpt: Baaz enables live video commerce for retailers globally. A retail store can host live videos, manage catalogs, live chats, payments, shipping, promotions and influencers from Baaz app. All things related to live video shopping in one place.
nodes.title: Baaz - Create virtual showroom in less than 1 min & sell online
nodes.author: Chitresh Parihar

nodes.excerpt: Startup Job Watch is a weekly updating database of over 6000 jobs from the top startups in the world. These are all companies that were on the best of lists from publications like Business Insider, Linkedin, AngelList, and more!
nodes.title: Startup Job Watch - Database of 6000+ jobs from the top startups in the world
nodes.author: Henry Johnson

nodes.excerpt: Fundraising Hours is an effortless office hour event connecting early-stage founders fundraising remotely. The founders can get notified when the investors open their office hours. Powered by Remotehour.
nodes.title: Fundraising Hours - Remotely connecting founders with committed investors
nodes.author: Shun Yamada

nodes.excerpt: Learn Azure Fundamentals is an app which helps you to learn the basics of Microsoft Azure and Cloud Computing by answering questions in tests. App contains 14 unique tests, 269 questions, 132 articles. Learn offline. App is absolutely free. No Ads.
nodes.title: Learn Azure Fundmentals - Learn Microsfot Azure fundamentals by passing tests
nodes.author: Denis Kazakov

nodes.excerpt: Itâ€™s a fun & easy solution for you and your friends to find the best movie or TV-show to watch on Netflix. Swipe through media name cards. If all your friends like the same movie, it's a match! Less scrolling more watching
nodes.title: Couchers - Less scrolling more watching.
nodes.author: Ali Raza Noorani

nodes.excerpt: Access your favourite Websites and Web Apps easily and quickly. Save the websites addresses and give them a custom name and icon, then easily access them from the Menu Bar or in an Always-on-Top window. Freely resize the menu window for a better experience
nodes.title: Surf - Access any website or web app from menu bar/floating window
nodes.author: Lucian Boiangiu

nodes.excerpt: Findnlink is a platform where you can share your projects and find co-founders/members. - Customize your project page - Create your own portfolio / profile - Show your skills We want to make Findnlink a great virtual workspace to connect teams together ğŸ‘Œ
nodes.title: Findnlink - Find people to work with on your ideas.
nodes.author: Emil Hopf

nodes.excerpt: Instantly play the most demanding PC games on your iPad in India. Requires iPadOS 14+ and an iPad compatible controller.
nodes.title: Doofy for iPad - Play any PC game on your iPad in India
nodes.author: Doofy Team

nodes.excerpt: Invoicer is a document based invoice maker app available exclusively on iOS/iPadOS/macOS platforms. All your invoice files and preferences are stored in iCloud so you can work seemlessly across different devices without the need to create an account for syncing.
nodes.title: Invoicer - Document based invoice maker app for iOS/iPadOS/macOS
nodes.author: Alex

nodes.excerpt: Daily-curated Remote Jobs for Everyone Features: - simple list (Hacker News style) - simple & fast search powered by Algolia - only the latest jobs from the last 30 days - no long descriptions, just simple titles and links - no ads - simple email newsletter
nodes.title: Remotelane 3.0 - Remote jobs for everyone with the most simple ux and search
nodes.author: ronatory

nodes.excerpt: For anyone wanting to improve their wellness and achieve their goals, the HistoricalMe app is your private, online space that makes it simple to record and track all elements of your daily life. Find out more about you with this diary app in 2021.
nodes.title: HistoricalMe - Diarise, organise and realise.
nodes.author: John Kellett

nodes.excerpt: Niceboard is the easiest way to start your own niche job board business, without writing a single line of code. Set up your board in minutes, connect your own domain, view real-time application stats, backfill jobs, translate it, use the private API and more!
nodes.title: Niceboard 2.0 - Start a job board. No code required.
nodes.author: Olivier

nodes.excerpt: A list of 9,000 badly executed products and apps. Are you looking for project ideas? Then this list could be useful to you. - 2,599 iOS Apps - 1,226 Chrome Extensions - 240 Web Apps (from ProductHunt) - 4,999 Android Apps Airtable access + JSON files
nodes.title: Validated ideas 2.0 - 9,000 popular but poorly executed apps
nodes.author: Huszko Jozsef

nodes.excerpt: Privacy policies and data request forms SHOULD be easy to find, but many companies hide them deep in their UI. Privacy hunt is a simple, free, crowd-sourced repository to reduce that to 1 click! ğŸ˜ Find a company, click on the link, and reclaim YOUR data. ğŸ™Œ
nodes.title: Privacy Hunt - We hunt data request forms, so you can reclaim YOUR data.

nodes.title: Culturely - All-in-one people engagement platform

nodes.excerpt: Help your friends get a job by embedding a widget on your website where you point visitors to your friends for jobs that you're not available for. Create your widget in the online generator and embed it on your website using an iframe. It's as simple as that.
nodes.title: Referrer - Painlessly refer your friends for jobs
nodes.author: Albin Groen

nodes.excerpt: Derived from the concept of planet rotation and all things of cosmos, The X Planet, an exquisite car freshener, is ingeniously designed in the shape of a planet.
nodes.title: X Planet - The Most Novel Car Freshener You Need

nodes.excerpt: Hacker News Front Page Explorer is a database of Ranked Hacker News Front Page posts. Some Example Use Cases:- - find ways to rank your post on the Front Page - discover top trends in HN Community. - build an App using this data
nodes.title: Hacker News Front Page Explorer - A database of top ranking Hacker News front page posts

nodes.excerpt: - Ref Career is a tool to maximise your chances of getting referred to an opening in any firm looking for candidates. - Get in touch with employees currently working with the firm willing to refer a potential candidate for the job opening.
nodes.title: refCareer - Online database for referrals
nodes.author: SARVESH DUBEY

nodes.excerpt: IOON is an innovative technology that helps you turn drinking water into a sanitizer with help of silver particles. It is safe for kids, pets, people with allergies and can be even used on food. Itâ€™s portable, stylish and you can recycle it!
nodes.title: IOON - Smart device that turns water into sanitizer.

nodes.excerpt: Imagine all the money we could unlock by selling subscriptions that we bought but don't really use anymore. flipp is a platform to post your pre-owned subscriptions for sale. we already have 500+ users interested in buying pre-owned subscriptions at unloved.
